title: Around the world :
author: Vanderslice, John
snippet: They left for Kandy by the afternoon train to-day.

title: Around the world :
author: Vanderslice, John
snippet: Kandy, Gampola, Nuwara Eliya, the Hakgala Gardens, Dimbula, and Nawalapitiya, are places on the list of the leader of the party to be visited in the next few days.

title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: The Goldneys' house is situated in apretty spot called Mount Victoria, and they have adelightful one-storied building, which belonged formerly tothe Sultan of Johore, surrounded by a large garden, andbeautiful views on every side ; the place recalled Ceylonand Kandy.

title: Four years in Great Britain.
author: Colton, Calvin
snippet: Along with this was exhibited, on a large table, a toy-like scene of a great and principal religious procession, at the city of Kandy, Island of Ceylon, carrying the sacred relics of Buddha.
